name: Hiker Scramble
description:
You are an Appalachian Trail thru-hiker - one of the few thousand brave (crazy?) souls who attempt to hike the entire length - approximately 2190 miles - of the Appalachian Trail in one year.  Try to reach Mount Katahdin by putting up big miles while avoiding the bears.  How long will it take you to get there?

Click a square of trail to turn it, and try to make a path from your tent to the next AT shelter.  Watch out for bears!

Note:
This game is an unfinished prototype.  I don't plan on continuing the project, but I decided to put it out here anyway in case anyone found it to be interesting/fun.
